documentation.text:
@notice This action enables the beneficiaries to withdraw a desired amount from this contract.
 @param _amount The amount in vesting coin desired to withdraw.

devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, vesting period. Optionally revocable by the creator.

params._vestingCoin: The ERC20 contract of the coin being vested.

returns._0: Returns true if the funding was successful.
Returns the closing balance of vesting coin held by this contract.

params._round: The round of which markleTree to be viewed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns._0: Returns true if the withdrawal was successful.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: The amount in vesting coin desired to withdraw.

devdoc.title: Vesting

fund().notice: Enables this vesting contract to receive the ERC20 (vesting coin). Before calling this function please approve your desired amount of the coin for this smart contract address. Please note that this action is restricted to administrators only.

getAvailableFunds().notice: The Vesting Token balance of this smart contract.

getMerkleRoot(uint256).notice: Gets the markle tree of each vesting Rounds.

removeFunds(uint256).notice: Allows you to withdraw the surplus balance of the vesting coin from this contract. Please note that this action is restricted to administrators only and you may only withdraw amounts above the sum total allocation balances.

setMerkleRoot(bytes32,uint256).notice: This action enables admin to set newMarkelRoot.

totalWithdrawn().notice: The sum total amount of tokens withdrawn from all allocations.

vestingCoin().notice: The ERC20 contract of the coin being vested.

withdraw(uint256,bytes32[],uint256).notice: This action enables the beneficiaries to withdraw a desired amount from this contract.
